title: KingofMice Author Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
Why do I have to put a rating module on my author page? Could you imagine if this page got downvoted enough to require its deletion? //"oh your works are fine but fuck you if you want to collect them in one place."// That would be hilarious actually
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[module CSS]]

.body-text {
    margin: 2% 13% 2% 9%;
    padding: 5px 20px 5px 20px;
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    color: #111;
}

.text4desk {
    width: 70%;
    margin: auto;
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

    .body-text {
        margin: 0% 4% 0% 4%;
    }

    .text4desk {
        width:100%;
    }

}


[[/module]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Me]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=kingsley|
    caption=Dr. Mice caught by surprise out of uniform
]]


**Name:** Dr. Kingsley O. Mice (He/She)[[footnote]]John or Max are also appropriate, //Kingsley// is really more of a character.[[/footnote]]
**Object Class:** Keter [[footnote]]breaking containment right fucking now!!![[/footnote]]
**Description:** Dr. Kingsley Mice is a weird little bug or perhaps a rodent that, via jumping on random keys of a keyboard, has coincidentally produced vaguely readable material. While he will escape any containment cell she's put in, he can be easily swayed back into containment by promises of food and chicken themed memorabilia.

In all seriousness, I got into SCP around 2022(? I'm not good with dates but I know it's been a while.) I went to one of those High Schools that gave out tablets to everyone (Gen Z babyyyy), and I became fascinated with the worlds and characters. I hope to leave my own little mark on the wiki :3

[[include component:image-block
    name=BirdShelf|
    caption=BEHOLD
]]
I also collect chicken figures this is very important for you to know about me!


[[/tab]]
[[tab Tales]]
[[=]]
[[size 1.5em]]**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/no-love-hub No Love For A Dead Man]**[[/size]]
My overly ambitious 4 Act white whale project. (Act 1 Complete)
[[/=]]

**Act 1 - These Walls Have Mold In Them**[[footnote]]Also humorously referred to as "moldhouse" or "the evil clears au"[[/footnote]]
Part 1: **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/lets-get-you-home Let's Get You Home]** - In which Dr. Gears walks into a bar.
Part 2: **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/i-need-you-to-leave I Need You to Leave]** - In which Dr. Gears makes a series of very bad choices.
Part 3: **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/this-is-not-a-place-of-honor This is Not a Place of Honor]** - In which Dr. Gears participates in improvisational theater.
Part 4: **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/nobody-runs-site-19 Nobody Runs Site-19]** - In which several loose ends are tied.
Finale **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/tomorrow-and-tomorrow-and-tomorrow Tomorrow and Tomorrow and Tomorrow Again]** - In which the world ends.

[[=]]
[[size 1.5em]]**MTF Gamma-86 aka “Losing Dogs” - A Saga**[[/size]]
My oc focused project.
[[/=]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/polly-the-hole 1 - Polly - The Hole]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ayla-losing-dogs 2 - Ayla - Losing Dogs]
